channel.title: Marrige help
channel.description: ok when i say marriage help i mean i have just made my server have marriage but idk how to make it so admins can prepose, can someone help

item.title: Marrige help
item.dc:creator: @DragonGuild DragonGuild
item.description:
@DragonGuild wrote:

There is usually a [TUT] for it. You just have to search in your client.java for whatever you right click on someone.

EX. If your on your server and you right click on me, it would say something likeâ€¦

|----------------------
|Attack DragonGuild |
|Follow DragonGuild |

Walk here DragonGuild

You would search: Attack

Make another one but make it say: Purpose

And then edit everything I hope i helped

Read full topic
